column2:
"Bravo, that is a wonderful outcome.
You completed this special training without any problems."

"You may not feel the progress that you've made,
but to others around you, the changes are as
clear as day."

"The precision of every one of your movements
is in a league all its own. And that could have only
been attained through time and effort."

"Now I'll have to come up with a follow-up boot
camp worthy of your skills. Until then..."

"お見事、素晴らしい結果ね。
今回の特訓も問題なくクリア、と。"

"実力が伸びている感じが薄いかも
しれないけれど、他者から見れば
その変化は明らかよ。"

"一つ一つの動きの精度が段違い。
それは、長い研鑽でしか得られない
時間と努力の為せる技だから。"

"今の貴方に相応しい次の特訓
しっかり考えないといけないわね。
それじゃ、また。"
